sense.gloss: one's place (in society, etc.), one's position
main part, meat (as opposed to bone, skin, etc.), wood (as opposed to bark), blade (as opposed to its handle), container (as opposed to its lid)
one's origin (e.g. city, country, parentage, school)
near oneself, close to one, familiar
friends, members of the same organization
sashimi (raw sliced fish, shellfish or crustaceans)
one's personal belongings, one's vicinity, one's daily life, everyday necessities
upper half of the body, upper body
antecedents, ancestor, previous position, previous existence, predecessor organization, predecessor organisation
taking sides (with), supporting, standing by, backing up
blow to a vital point of a person's body, striking techniques (judo)

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓に↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑良識↑↓りょうしき↓の↑第一歩↑↓だいいっぽ↓だ。
sdata.e: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.

sdata.j: ↑物事↑↓ものごと↓は、ありのまま↑見↑↓み↓るのではなく、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓をそこに↑見↑↓み↓る。
sdata.e: We don't see things as they are, but as we are.

sdata.j: ↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑犯↑↓はん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑終身↑↓しゅうしん↓↑刑↑↓けい↓に↑処↑↓しょ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はフランス↑国籍↑↓こくせき↓を↑持↑↓も↓っているがベトナム↑出身↑↓しゅっしん↓です。
sdata.e: I have French nationality but Vietnamese origins.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑指示↑↓しじ↓に↑従↑↓したが↓う↑事↑↓こと↓を↑身↑↓み↓につけなければいけない。
sdata.e: You must learn to obey instructions.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓の↑運命↑↓うんめい↓の↑主↑↓おも↓でもあります。
sdata.e: You are the master of your own destiny.

sdata.e: You must form regular habits.
